snippet: Hundreds of protesters called for the man’s punishment over suspicions that he killed an army officer in a traffic dispute.
abstract: Syrian authorities arrest Suleiman al-Assad, relative of Pres Bashar al-Assad, following demands of protesters amid allegations that he killed an army officer in a traffic dispute.
lead_paragraph: Hundreds of protesters called for the man’s punishment over suspicions that he killed an army officer in a traffic dispute.

headline.main: Syria: Assad Relative Is Arrested After Protests Over a Killing
headline.print_headline: Middle East; Syria: Assad Relative Is Arrested After Protests Over a Killing
